column2: Amie. We understand your frustration.  Due to the fact that we have been messaging on Facebook Messenger about the incident already
column3: we will continue to correspond with you that way unless you prefer Yelp private messaging.  If you need anything via Yelp
column4: please let us know.  Thank you for the review and as mentioned
column5: we will continue to coordinate with you as we have been
column6: via Facebook messenger and can hopefully resolve the situation as we had previously discussed.  The landlord
column9: but we will discuss with you in more depth on Facebook.  Thank you again.
